mapper.sql: ID, FullName, SN, Password, HomePage, EligibleDat, Address, OrgType, ManagerName, ManagerMoblie, City, TrainingCenter, FlyingCamp, Prop1, Prop2, AddUser, AddTime, Email, Phone,Status
mapper.select: select * from hx_people where BelongTeam=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (EligibleDat is not null and (YEAR(EligibleDat) >= YEAR(now())))
select * from hx_people where BelongTeam= #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (YearFeeStatus is null OR YearFeeStatus!=2)
SELECT * from hx_team where FlyingCamp is not NULL
SELECT * from hx_team where TrainingCenter is not NULL
select * from hx_team where EligibleDat is not null and YEAR(EligibleDat) >= YEAR(now())
SELECT * from hx_team where hx_team.`Status` is null OR `Status` !=2;
mapper.insert: insert into hx_team (ID, FullName, SN, Password, HomePage, EligibleDat, Address, OrgType, ManagerName, ManagerMoblie, City, TrainingCenter, FlyingCamp, Prop1, Prop2, AddUser, AddTime, Email, Phone, Status,Introduce) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eligibledat,jdbcType=DATE}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managermoblie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingcenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flyingcamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update hx_team
FullName = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HomePage = #{homepage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EligibleDat = #{eligibledat,jdbcType=DATE},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OrgType = #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ManagerName = #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ManagerMoblie = #{managermoblie,jdbcType=INTEGER},
City = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TrainingCenter = #{trainingcenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FlyingCamp = #{flyingcamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Prop1 = #{prop1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Prop2 = #{prop2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddUser = #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE},
Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
